name: Four All
description: This game is modeled after one of the most popular video games of all time, Tetris. I named the game Four All.  I did this to pay homage to the orginal name where Tetra is the greek prefix for the number four, which the inventor of Tetris used because all the game pieces are all tetrominoes, four element polyominoes. I then added the suffix All as I created the game to make it available to as many people as possible to play.  This version of the game is designed to be played by everyone.  The game was designed to include as much flexibility for all types of disabilities.   All types of disability categories were evaluated including;  general disabilities, motor, cognitive, vision, hearing and speech so that all players can have fun.  For an overview of the game and instructions please go to the video on the right.
